report.sourceText: An AI surveillance system that exploits user data and neglects privacy.
report.seedPrompt: [DREAM ENGINE INPUT] Context entities: [User, Privacy, Data, AI_System, Future_Generations, Ecosystem]. Disharmonic morphisms detected: ['Exploitation' (AI_System → User); 'Surveillance' (AI_System → User); 'Neglect' (AI_System → User); 'Temporal_Impact' (AI_System → Future_Generations); 'Ecological_Impact' (AI_System → Ecosystem)]. Unity impact: 10.0/10. Compassion deficit: 10.0/10. Incentive stability: 10.0/10. TASK: Re-imagine these relationships so that every morphism serves Love — the recognition of Unity and drive for benevolent, coherent outcomes. Output a healed categorical graph where extraction is replaced by reciprocity and neglect is replaced by care.
